reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel on a business trip and i managed to get a better deal than my client could get me so it is worth while you speaking directly to the hotel. The food at the hotel is real good value for money and the portions were very filling. The only downside to the hotel is that my neghbour decided to have a bath at 1am in the morning and the noise levels from them filling up the bath were extreme. The accommodation is separate from the main reception building so was a little worrying for a woman alone. The swimming pool looked inviting and there were families using the facilities.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: 22 of us arrived at the hotel about 1 hour before tee off and were met with very friendly reception staff who let us book into our rooms straight away.
reviews.title: Weekend Golfing Break

reviews.text: Got to the tee and was met by a very friendly starter who explained rules and regs of the course and set us off on our way - no rushing or queue jumping - very pleasant.
reviews.title: Adequate

reviews.text: Course was in good condition for the time of year.
reviews.title: CAN'T BELIEVE WE ARE ALL TALKING ABOUT THE SAME HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After the game we used all the facilities on offer - swiiming pool, sauna and steam room.
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay there again. Terrible food - urgh

reviews.text: The hotel is very nice! Kind staff! And very calm place. We spent a week at the hotel and was very pleasant. Excelent gym and pool! It is a little bit far from Colchester (20 km), but if you have a car, that won't be a problem. The price is very good and the place is beautiful (garden, golf camp). I recommend.
reviews.title: Nice place to relax...

reviews.text: Stayed here through work and yes the name is slightly grand for what it actually is. But it is clean, nice big rooms, the facilities with the gym and pool are fantastic and the staff were great.
reviews.title: Great value great facilities good little place

reviews.text: I had no complaints at all about thr food which was hot served quickly and tasted fine. I had dinner and breakfast
reviews.title: Overnight Stay in December

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the bar and resturant were really friendly and I would definately recommend the hotel to others.
reviews.title: Nice for a weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is unlike ordinary hotels as it is part of a sports complex.
reviews.title: Good hotel, pleasant staff, good facilities

reviews.text: We stayed here from May 22-June 5.
reviews.title: warm and welcoming!!

reviews.text: My husband,son and I had a great experience and we have to send a special thanķ you to all the girls at the front desķ and most of all to Bruce,Stuart,Sacha and Guy upstairs at the Pulse restaurant. You all are truely amazing people. Always was greated with a smile. Thank you from the three of us!
reviews.title: Very much geered up for golf not hotel guests

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the previous posting which had some ridicus complaints serious now some people need to get a reality check.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Good course, shame about the food

reviews.text: The quality of food at breakfast was beautiful which was probably my only very positive comment.
reviews.title: Nice hotel great golf

reviews.text: I booked in for two nights in November as I was working in the area, it actually was so nice I booked in for another night a week later.
reviews.title: Very nice place and a great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was quick and efficient and the young lady's at reception were very helpful and pleasant.
reviews.title: Great for health & sport enthusiasts

reviews.text: My room was Lovely. Very well cleaned with a big double bed soft lighting and very nicely decorated in modern style. The bathroom was really clean and a nice big deep bath with very good water pressure.
reviews.title: Golf & Country Club Hotel

reviews.text: Each night I had dinner in the bar which has a good menu and is quite informal.
reviews.title: A bit like a Premier Inn but with thinner walls.

reviews.text: Breakfast is served in the same bar and although not cooked to order, but in buffet style
reviews.title: Golf Break Heaven
